mapper.sql: id, name, type, organize_id, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, manage_ip, responsible, responsible_phone, location, online_status_code
a.id, a.name, a.type, a.organize_id, a.create_user, a.create_time, a.update_user, a.update_time, a.manage_ip, a.responsible, a.responsible_phone, a.location, a.online_status_code
mapper.select: select , a.remarks,at.name_ch type_name,o.name organize_name from asset a left join asset_type at on a.type = at.id left join organization o on a.organize_id = o.id where 1=1
select ,at.name_ch type_name from asset a left join asset_type at on a.type = at.id where 1=1 and a.manage_ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and at.name_ch = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ,o.name organize_name from asset a left join organization o on a.organize_id = o.id where 1=1 and a.manage_ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.name = #{organizeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into asset (id, name, type, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, manage_ip, responsible, responsible_phone, location, online_status_code, remarks) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{manageIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsiblePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlineStatusCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into asset ( id, name, type, organize_id, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, manage_ip, responsible, responsible_phone, location, online_status_code ) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.name}, #{item.type}, #{item.organizeId}, #{item.createUser}, now(), #{item.updateUser}, now(), #{item.manageIp}, #{item.responsible}, #{item.responsiblePhone}, #{item.location}, #{item.onlineStatusCode})
mapper.update:
update asset
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organize_id = #{organizeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
manage_ip = #{manageIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
responsible = #{responsible,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
responsible_phone = #{responsiblePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
online_status_code = #{onlineStatusCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update asset set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, manage_ip = #{manageIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, responsible = #{responsible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, responsible_phone = #{responsiblePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, online_status_code = #{onlineStatusCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
